description.fr: {#CRITICAL}\_: Piochez {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Spell.327.d2}\_{%water}. \--- {value:Spell.327.d2bis,percent,+} aux DÉGÂTS CRITIQUES du prochain {%SPELLCOUNT,plural:one} que vous jouez.
description.en: {#CRITICAL}: Draw {value:Spell.327.d2}\_{%water} {%SPELLCOUNT,value:Spell.327.d2}. \--- {value:Spell.327.d2bis,percent,+} to the CRITICAL DAMAGE of the next {%SPELLCOUNT,plural:one} that you play.
description.es: {#CRITICAL}: Sacas {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Spell.327.d2} de\_{%water}. \--- {value:Spell.327.d2bis,percent,+} a los DAÑOS CRÍTICOS del próximo {%SPELLCOUNT,plural:one} que lances.
description.de: {#CRITICAL}: Zieht {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Spell.327.d2} vom Typ {%water}. \--- {value:Spell.327.d2bis,percent,+} KRITISCHER SCHADEN für den nächsten {%SPELLCOUNT,plural:one}, den du ausspielst.
description.pt: {#CRITICAL}: Compre {SPELLCOUNTvalue:Spell.327.d2}\_de\_{%water}. \--- {value:Spell.327.d2bis,percent,+} aos DANOS CRÍTICOS do próximo {%SPELLCOUNT,plural:one} que você lançar.
